sys_remote_update_set.description: When approval is sent to CAB on Emergency/Urgent changes, allow approval without opening change Possibly set comments on approval to populate the CAB approval. Currently, the user must go to the change, add CAB Recommendation, save the change, then go back to approval to approve.
sys_remote_update_set.name: GP_STRY0012333_CAB_approval_on_Emergency/Urgent_changes
